pusha t: marcelo burlon just released the promotional teaser to his upcoming spring/summer 2014 collection. the visuals for his marcelo burlon; country of milan brand keeps the core t shirt designs while venturing out into wind breakers shorts tank tops sweaters hoodies and a mask. the additional pieces tease us with even more unique animal inspired prints  the video itself is interesting for those of the hip hop community as it features a chopped and screwed version of pusha ts numbers on the boards. pusha and burlon are no strangers theyre so close the pair released a collection together earlier in the year. look for these and more designs from burlon later this year at his website  this piece has been an experiment for style genius what do you think leave your thoughts below
